1971年交通事故準據法公約: Convention on the Law Applicable to Traffic Accidents, 4 May 1971

1970年民商事件在國外取得證據公約: Convention on the Taking of Evidence Abroad in Civil or Commercial Matters, 18 March 1970

1973年關於死亡者遺產之國際管理公約: Convention of 2 October 1973 Concerning the International Administration of the Estates of Deceased Persons

1973年產品責任準據法公約: Convention of 2 October 1973 on the Law Applicable to Products Liability

1973年關於扶養義務裁決之承認與執行公約: Convention of 2 October 1973 on the Recognition and Enforcement of Decisions Relating to Maintenance Obligations

1973年扶養義務準據法公約: Convention of 2 October 1973 on the Law Applicable to Maintenance Obligations

1978年夫妻財產制準據法公約: Convention of 14 March 1978 on the Law Applicable to Matrimonial Property Regimes

1978年婚姻之成立及效力承認公約: Convention of 14 March 1978 on Celebration and Recognition of the Validity of Marriages

1978年代理準據法公約: Convention of 14 March 1978 on the Law Applicable to Agency

1980年國際略誘兒童民事問題之公約: Convention of 25 October 1980 on the Civil Aspects of International Child Abduction

1980年國際近用司法公約: Convention of 25 October 1980 on International Access to Justice

1985年信託之準據法及其承認公約: Convention of 1 July 1985 on the Law Applicable to Trusts and on their Recognition

1993年兒童保護及關於跨國境收養合作公約: Convention of 29 May 1993 on Protection of Children and Co-operation in Respect of Intercountry Adoption

1996年關於父母責任及子女保護措施之管轄、準據法、承認、執行及合作之公約: Convention of 19 October 1996 on Jurisdiction, Applicable Law, Recognition, Enforcement and Co-operation in Respect of Parental Responsibility and Measures for the Protection of Children

2000年成年人國際保護公約: Convention of 13 January 2000 on the International Protection of Adults

2006年中介者所保管之有價證券若干權利之準據法公約: Convention of 5 July 2006 on the Law Applicable to Certain Rights in Respect of Securities held with an Intermediary

2005年選擇法院協議公約: Convention of 30 June 2005 on Choice of Court Agreements

2007年國際追償子女撫育費及其他形式之親屬扶養公約: Convention of 23 November 2007 on the International Recovery of Child Support and Other Forms of Family Maintenance

2007年扶養義務準據法議定書: Protocol of 23 November 2007 on the Law Applicable to Maintenance Obligations

國際商務契約選法原則: Principles on Choice of Law in International Commercial Contracts

2019年民商事件外國判決之承認與執行公約: Convention of 2 July 2019 on the Recognition and Enforcement of Foreign Judgments in Civil or Commercial Matters
